name: SSF1
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: Solitary vs Multifocal Tumor
notes: **Note**:  The AJCC definition for multifocal tumor differs from the Multiple Primary/Histology (MP/H) definition for Multiplicity Counter.  Use code 020 for any tumor with multiple foci, even if foci are not measured.
